work_experiences.description: Selected for a highly competitive fellowship program focused on infrastructure engineering. Collaborated with a teammate to build this portfolio project from scratch, applying principles of system design, deployment, and full-stack development.

Developed an interoperability service for MATLAB, Python, and Julia using Apache Arrow and DuckDB. Enabled efficient data transfer and scientific computing with a high-performance backend, socket communication, and API design.
Created and maintained test plans and test cases, conducted manual and automated testing using Python and JMeter, and integrated tests into the CI/CD process to reduce test time by 75%.
Provided tailored financial planning services to clients. Maintained a 95% client retention rate through consistent service and up-to-date knowledge of insurance products and market trends.

education.degree: Master of Science in Software Design and Development
education.details: Expected to graduate in Sep 2025 with a first class honours degree.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration in Quantitative Finance and Risk Management
education.details: Graduated with a first class honours degree.
